to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.

sentences.english: It must have looked and sounded like the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 肯定好像世界末日来临了一样。

sentences.english: Foreign - funded enterprises over the past few days have been close-out cigarettes on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 连日来外资企业已纷纷对香烟进行清仓处理。

sentences.english: I am following with great concern the tragic events of recent days in Nigeria.
sentences.chinese: 对于近日来发生在尼日利亚的惨案，我深表关切。

sentences.english: The quake was the second to shake the Tokyo area in as many days.
sentences.chinese: 这场地震是连日来第二场发生在东京周边的地震。

sentences.english: In recent days, Qiongshan City to take a major move to prefectural city Fengxiang Road correlation.
sentences.chinese: 连日来，琼山市采取大动作，对府城凤翔路进行整容。

sentences.english: These days we often hear about "the classless society".
sentences.chinese: 近日来我们经常听到“无阶级社会”的说法。

sentences.english: This is done in astronomy, with the help of the julian day .
sentences.chinese: 天文学上就是借助儒略日来算的。

sentences.english: But Haitians ravenous from days without nourishment say the food is not nearly enough.
sentences.chinese: 但对连日来缺乏营养的海地人说，食品远远不够。

sentences.english: The threat of H1N1 may have eased in recent days.
sentences.chinese: 近日来，H1N1的威胁已经缓解。

sentences.english: Which brings me back to what passes for budget debate in Washington these days.
sentences.chinese: 这都让我联想到了华盛顿近日来的预算案辩论。

sentences.english: That wear this world out to the ending doom.
sentences.chinese: 直到世界末日来临精气耗完。

sentences.english: When the end of the state gos, we'; ll understand what to blame.
sentences.chinese: 当全地球末日来临时咱们将清楚该去责备什么。

sentences.english: It is a the-beginning-of-the-end-of-the-world story, hollywood style.
sentences.chinese: 片子是灾难片，好莱坞式的末日来临。

sentences.english: Ebook sales are soaring, accompanied by dire predictions about the future of publishing.
sentences.chinese: 电子书销售不断飙升，预示着出版业的末日来临。
